content: 1 purl 51 cm/20 only round 2 knit ws k3 m1 k2 m1 k3 m1 24 times k3 repeat round 1 & 2 until sleeve measures 14 total 175 sts 15 5 16 5 cm/5 5 6 6 5 inches ending with round 1 all sizes row 1 rs k3 m3 k5twice m5 repeat to bind off knitwise last 9 sts k5twice m3 k3 finishing row 2 ws k6 sp5tog k5 repeat to last 11 sts sp5tog k6 weave in ends block cardigan according to yarn care advice row 3 4 5 & 6 knit sew on buttons row 7 rs k3 k3twice m5 k5twice repeat acknowledgements to last 7sts m5 k3twice k3 thank you to amanda jeannie and maria for row 8 ws k3 sp3tog k5 sp5tog repeat to testing this pattern also to elena and monika last 11 sts k5 sp3tog k3 for editing advice special thanks to colour adventures row 9 10 11 & 12 knit yarns/anadiomena designs for producing such yummy yarns repeat row 1 to 12 until work measures about 13 5 16 5 18 5 cm/5 5 6 5 7 5 inches from copyright the underarm cast on sts ending with a ws the copyright of the pattern remains with row janet cullen this pattern is available from ravelry com and knit every round for 1 5 cm/0 5 inch or until craftsy com skirt measures 15 18 20 cm/6 7 8 inches you may make cardigans for sale from this from underarm cast on ending with a ws row pattern please consider posting project photos on bind off knitwise ravelry or craftsy if you have enjoyed this design i would love to see them © janet cullen 2013
